Detailed Description

Base class for draw styles that the user can select from the viewport drop-down list.

Any draw styles which should be available to the user for selecting need to be derived from this class. Subclasses must implement the getPixmap() to return the icon that will be displayed in the viewport drop-down list, and getDescription() to return the text that accompanies the icon.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzUserDrawStyle::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]

Derived classes should return a description for display in the viewport drop-down list.

Implemented in DzWireBoxStyle, DzSolidBoxStyle, DzWireFrameStyle, DzLitWireFrameStyle, DzHiddenLineStyle, DzWireShadedStyle, DzSmoothShadedStyle, DzWireTexturedStyle, and DzTexturedStyle.

QWidget * DzUserDrawStyle::getPane ( QWidget *  parent  )  const [inline, virtual]

Derived classes can return a panel that contains numeric controls, etc for manipulating the parameters of the draw style, which will be displayed in the Effects pane.

QPixmap DzUserDrawStyle::getPixmap (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]

Derived classes should return an icon for display in the viewport drop-down list.

Implemented in DzWireBoxStyle, DzSolidBoxStyle, DzWireFrameStyle, DzLitWireFrameStyle, DzHiddenLineStyle, DzWireShadedStyle, DzSmoothShadedStyle, DzWireTexturedStyle, and DzTexturedStyle.

Property Documentation

bool DzUserDrawStyle::isEnabled [read]

Derived classes can return false if the user should not be able to select the draw style e.g. if the shader for the draw style could not be successfully compiled.
